description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A statement of the means by which the Nelson coat was obtained by Sir N. H. Nicolas. Together with copies of letters, etc. relating to Lord Nelson and Lady Hamilton. Also some unpublished particulars of the trial and execution of Caraccioli, and the capitulation of the Castles of Naples" Author: EVANS, T. A. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1311.b.15." Page: 81 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1846 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001178929 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
